analysisEngineMetaData.name: EvaluatorDescriptor
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
According to Alkesh Patel's email, this component just compares the gold standard and whatever output(0 or 1) the scorer gave and print the accuracy. For example,
Q. Who shot Lincoln? A 1 1 Booth shot Lincoln A 1 0 Booth killed Lincoln A 0 0 Booth didn't kill Lincoln
where, first number is gold standard, second number is what was predicted by the scorer. According to this example, accuracy of the system will be, 2/3 i.e. 66.67%
